name: SectorC
description:
IMPORTANT

This game was made by one person in 3 hours for TRIJAM 204.

TRIJAM: https://itch.io/jam/trijam-204

PRE-MADE ASSETS

No pre-made assets were used in this project. All sounds, 3D and 2D designs were made in 3 hours.

GAMEPLAY

You need to hit the red buttons to complete levels.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

LMB - Shoot
